alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 01 at 1:31AM MDT until November 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until noon MDT today. For the High Wind Watch, from early Thursday through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
